definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: The doctor pulled his hood forward, hiding his face .
sentences.chinese: 大夫把袍子上的帽子向前拉了一拉，遮住他的臉。

sentences.english: You get a gown, but its coverage is more psychological than physical!
sentences.chinese: 你會有一件袍子，但是它更多隻能起到心理作用。

sentences.english: His black cassock was dusty and sweat-stained.
sentences.chinese: 的袍子上盡是塵土，汗漬斑斑。

sentences.english: The light-colored cloth of this collar reflects light that illuminated part of the woman's face.
sentences.chinese: 這個帶領子的淺色袍子能夠把光反射到女人的臉上。

sentences.english: Instead she slipped into a hooded robe and stepped out onto her terrace.
sentences.chinese: 於是她披上帶帽袍子踏入了她的露臺。

sentences.english: She put a white gown on me and pinned it at the neck in back with a safety pin.
sentences.chinese: 她給我披上一件白袍子，脖子後邊用個釦針扣住。

sentences.english: They stripped him and put a scarlet robe on him
sentences.chinese: 他們給他脫了衣服，穿上一件硃紅色袍子。

sentences.english: Attached, the figure of a monkey in Persian robes playing the cymbals.
sentences.chinese: 上面有一隻身穿波斯袍子敲着鐃鈸的玩具猴。

sentences.english: And they stripped him, and put on him a scarlet robe.
sentences.chinese: 他們給他脫了衣服，穿上一件硃紅色袍子。

sentences.english: In the original painting, the woman is wearing a simple collar of light-colored cloth.
sentences.chinese: 在原畫上，這個女人穿的是一個有這單領的淺色袍子。

sentences.english: Bin Laden’s gold-threaded robes worn during his video addresses hung behind a curtain in the media room.
sentences.chinese: 本拉登在講話中穿的黃金絲線袍子掛在媒體室的簾後。

sentences.english: The light-colored cloth of this collar reflects light that illuminated part of the woman's face.
sentences.chinese: 這個帶領子的淡色袍子可以把光反射到女性的臉上。

sentences.english: Mengke has changed into his new winter robe.
sentences.chinese: 孟克換上了過冬的新袍子。

sentences.english: Please give that new garment a graceful bearing .
sentences.chinese: 給那件新袍子一個風姿吧。

sentences.english: He brought forth a small gold amulet from beneath his robe.
sentences.chinese: 他從袍子下面拿出一個不大的金護身符。

sentences.english: He wore a yukata, a light Japanese robe of blue cotton.
sentences.chinese: 他穿着和服，一件藍色棉質日本袍子。

definition: long gown/cheongsam/traditional Asian dress for men or (in Hong Kong) women's qipao
fur-lined changpao 長袍|长袍[chang2 pao2]
Chinese-style long robe worn as outermost garment/burqa
